titleStmt.title: To all people that profess the eternal truth of the living God this is a true and real demonstration of the cause why I have denied and do deny the authority of George Fox ...
titleStmt.author: Harwood, John.

notesStmt.note: "This is only to go amongst Friends in all countreys, nations and islands where George Fox's Papers of enmity against the innocent hath passed.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
